content.rendered:
This week in our weekly update we have fixed some old issues and brought in some new features. What are they? let’s find out.

What’s New:

  • Enhancing the user experience during the onboarding process.
  • Implemented a whitelisting system for tokens in asset holding
  • Added NFT data to the wallet details section.
  • Incorporate country and device data in the wallet connections for a better understanding of user data.
  • Added Privacy Policy while onboarding on Spock.

What’s Fixed:

  • Resolve any issues related to displaying wallet information.
  • Address any pricing issues related to tokens in wallet detail
  • Address issues related to SDK data leakage.
  • Resolve issues related to active wallets and visitors on the dashboard.

What’s Improved:

  • Implement a system for managing asset holdings.
  • Improve the synchronization time of tokens’ server-side data.
  • Implement skeleton screens throughout the app to improve user experience.
  • Make UI improvements on the pricing screen.

Spock needs your feedback to improve more. Visit spockanalytics.xyz and use our free interactable demo and provide us with your feedback at hello@spockanalytics.xyz.
